name: New Age Beverages Corporation
description: New Age Beverages Corporation is a health-focused beverage company that operates in the rapidly growing sector of functional beverages. Founded in 2017 and based in Denver, Colorado, New Age Beverages specializes in a variety of organic and health-oriented products, including ready-to-drink teas, coffees, and other functional beverages. The company is committed to providing consumers with healthier beverage options that cater to their wellness needs. New Age Beverages has gained recognition for its innovative product lines, including the Marley brand of beverages, which pays homage to the legendary Bob Marley and is aimed at promoting a healthy lifestyle through natural ingredients. In addition to Marley, the company offers a diverse portfolio of brands, including the recently launched 'Buddha,' which focuses on superfood-infused beverages. New Age Beverages prides itself on sustainability and ethical sourcing, aligning its business practices with the growing consumer demand for transparency and health consciousness. The company continues to expand its distribution channels and product offerings to meet the evolving preferences of health-oriented consumers, establishing itself as a leader in the functional beverage market.

seo.meta_title: New Age Beverages Corporation | Health-Focused Functional Beverages
seo.meta_description: Explore New Age Beverages Corporation, a leading provider of health-oriented functional beverages. Discover innovative products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does New Age Beverages specialize in?
faq.answer: New Age Beverages specializes in health-focused functional beverages, including organic teas and coffees.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of New Age Beverages?
faq.answer: Brent Willis is the CEO of New Age Beverages Corporation.

faq.question: Where is New Age Beverages headquartered?
faq.answer: New Age Beverages is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, USA.

faq.question: What are some popular products from New Age Beverages?
faq.answer: Some popular products include Marley Beverage and Buddha Beverages.

faq.question: When was New Age Beverages founded?
faq.answer: New Age Beverages was founded in 2017.
